reviews.review_msg: She actually refuses to help students saying we should be able to figure it out. She won't say what she is looking for when marking and her marking is very inconsistant. I think that she has no clue what she wants and that's why her grades have no reasoning behind them and why she won't tell you how things can improve.

Don't know why she gets bad ratings. She is a fair marker, posts her notes on webct and knows her info. A reading and writing extensive class thou. Mandatory particip, 2 essays & exam (8 pg and 11 pg) Either she was a horrible teacher in the past and has changed, or students want a prof that hands out A's to everyone.  This is all coming from a C+/
oh boy she is a tough marker but i guess the lecure was alrite--she keeps talking and pbl sucks. anyways this class not a gpa booster --dont take the class she's a tough marker

Very interesting lectures, but that's about it. PBL was terrible and a joke, very unclear instructions, unhelpful, insulting, pushes her opinions on the class, was basically a course on sexuality and gender, not the history of the family in Canada.  Our final exam was on Bill C-38 and whether we thought it should be passed? I mean really....

She is so tough with marking. It is tough to get a good mark with her. Not only that but she is a total feminisht. I dont know if this class is much about family. Plus she makes you do so many readings which dont help you much in any way. Remember you have other classes and your time will be consume

worse prof ever. unhelpful, unapproachable, pushes her ideas onto the class. very proud of living alternt lifestyle and pushes her anti-hetersexual views onto class discussions. moods swings mak for hostile classroom. work overload no help, no choices on papers limited scope in teaching

Lectures were interesting but the assignments were unclear and marked unfairly.  She gives enough reading and writing to make this a 400 lvl course but she gives students NO choice. Topics are all written by her and reflect her interests -leads to a serious shortage of research material. AVOID!

This class was supposed to be about family but according to the prof,family is composed of gay/lesbian people and women.what about dad, grandma, grandpa, uncles, aunts and oh yeah kids?? DO NOT TAKE ANY CLASSES WITH THIS PROF! unfair marking,sarcastic,unrealistic # of readings.from a 3.5gpa student

Wow, she was the worst Prof I have ever had, Way too much reading, assignments are not clear and she marks extremly hard and unfairly. DO NOT TAKE HER CLASS. Total feminist bull'ish and I am a Feminist! She goes way to far!
interesting and funny, The first Can. hist. class I've actually enjoyed. highly recommended

Probably the worst prof I've encountered in my experience spanning community college, undergrad and graduate studies. If this is the same guy from UBC, its a shame SFU took him on.  His classes are poorly executed with scattered content and he offers very little in the way of insight.  Avoid him if possible.  He should not be an educator.
